name: "Chip"
effect: A Dude may only have one "Chip" attached. This Dude may not refuse a call out.

name: Abel Owens Exp.
effect: Experienced. Noon: Target a Dude at this location with one or more Spells attached. Abel calls out the Dude.

name: Abomination Pit
effect: Improvement. While there is at least one Terror at this location, the Fear level is increased by 1 (maximum 10).

name: Agoraphobia
effect: Noon: Target a Dude in play. The Dude has a -2 Bullet penalty (minimum 0) and a -2 Influence penalty (minimum 0) until after Nightfall while in the Town Square.

name: All God's Children
effect: All Deeds with "Church", "Chapel", or "Mission" in their title have their Production increased by +2 and are worth 1 additional Control Point, until after Nightfall.

name: Ammunitionist
effect: Private. Controller Noon: Boot this Deed to target a Bullet card in your Boot Hill. Move that card to your discard pile. Controller Noon: Boot this Deed to target a Bullet card in your discard pile. Shuffle that card into your deck.

name: Andrew Garret
effect: Reaction: Use when another player declares the target of a job. You may unboot up to two of your Dudes that are at or adjacent to the target's location.

name: Animate Hand
effect: Abomination. There is no limit to the number of Animate Hands that each player may have in play. Animate Hands cannot attach Goods. Card memory does not apply to Animate Hands. Any Dudes with higher Values in a posse opposing an Animate Hand have the ability - Shootout: Boot this Dude to ace an Animate Hand in the opposing posse. Reduce this Dude's Bullet rating to 0 until the end of the shootout.

name: April Segarra
effect: When April calls out a Wanted dude, that dude may not refuse.

name: Auxiliumortis
effect: Select a Terror in play. The Terror is booted and may not be targeted with actions this turn.

name: Banish
effect: Shootout Hex X: Target a Dude in the opposing posse. X is the Value of the Dude. If the Hex succeeds, the Dude's text box is blank until the end of the shootout.

name: Barney Brash
effect: Mad Scientist:1 Barney may not create non-Weapon Gadgets. If Barney has a Weapon Gadget ready, he does not need to boot to join a posse in an adjacent location.

name: Between the Cracks
effect: Reaction: Play when one of your Dudes is called out. Your Dude refuses the call out and must move to an adjacent location. If your Dude is not Wanted, the Dude who called your Dude out becomes Wanted.

name: Bioengineering
effect: Unique. Gadget Difficulty:9 Noon Pull: Target a Dude in play and make a skill check using this Dude's Mad Scientist skill (if any). If the skill check exceeds the target Dude's Value, all copies of the target become non-Unique and players may have any number of that Dude in play. Card memory does not apply to copies of that Dude. These changes are permanent.

name: Bites the Hand
effect: Bites the Hand may not attach Goods cards that can only be attached to Sioux Dudes.

name: Blackjacks- Rachel's Gang
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:17 Noon: Boot this Outfit and pay 2 ghost rock to get a Job Action card from your deck, show it to the other players, and add it to your Play hand. Discard a card from your Play hand and shuffle your deck.

name: Blasted Prairie
effect: Private. Out of Town. Controller Noon: Target a skilled Dude at this location. That Dude's skill is doubled for his or her next Skill Check this turn. After that Skill Check, the Dude loses the skill until after Nightfall.

name: Bloodsport Arena
effect: Private. Control of the Arena is determined using Bullet ratings instead of Influence. Controller Noon: Target two Dudes at this location controlled by different players. Those Dudes start a shootout which other Dudes cannot join. All cards attached to those Dudes are considered blank until the end of the shootout.

name: Breath of the Spirits
effect: Noon Spirit 6: Target one of your booted Dudes. If this Spirit succeeds, boot this Shaman to unboot the target Dude.

name: Brimstone Bullets
effect: Bullet. Shootout: Target a Wanted Dude in the opposing posse. Ace the Brimstone Bullets to ace the target Dude.

name: Bring It Down!
effect: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: "Noon: Target a Dude in this location with a lower Value, and move the Dude to his or her home. That Dude may not move to this location until after Nightfall." Ace this card.

name: Brush with Death
effect: Noon Miracle 9: Target a Dude in Boot Hill. If this Miracle succeeds, move that Dude to his or her owner's discard pile.

name: Cadaverus Mobilis
effect: Once this turn, as a Noon action, you may unboot one Terror in play. Ace this card.

name: Cain Regen Exp.
effect: Experienced. Shootout: Target a Draw Dude in Cain's posse with the Blessed or Huckster skill. The Dude is a Stud until after Nightfall.

name: Channel Fort
effect: Private. Government. Texas Rangers Dudes may not move to this Location. The ghost rock cost to bring this Deed into play is reduced by 2 if you are an Agency player.

name: Charlie Landers Exp.
effect: Experienced. Charlie cannot be called out or move to a location you do not control. While Charlie is in a Saloon, that Saloon gains a +1 Control Point bonus.

name: Claustrophobia
effect: Noon: Target a Dude in play. The Dude has a -1 Bullet penalty (minimum 0) and a -1 Influence penalty (minimum 0) until after Nightfall while at an in-town Deed or their Home.

name: Clean Getaway
effect: Reaction: Play immediately before one of your Dudes becomes Wanted. Move the Dude to an out-of-town location, and the Dude no longer becomes Wanted.

name: Clovis The Devilbunny
effect: Mystical. Reaction: Boot the Devilbunny when this Dude is aced. If you are the Winner, the Dude is not aced, but is sent home booted instead. This Dude does not unboot during Nightfall this turn.

name: Confessional
effect: Public. Holy Ground. Wanted Dudes are not considered Wanted while at this location.

name: Construction Crew
effect: Noon Job: Boot one of your Dudes to start a job that targets the Town Square. Any player may defend the job, starting with the Winner and going clockwise. Before posses are formed, select an in-town Deed with a ghost rock cost less than 7 and show it to the other players. If the job succeeds, put the Deed into play with no ghost rock cost. If the job fails, put the Deed into Boot Hill.

name: Darren Titus Exp.
effect: Experienced. Darren's Influence cannot be greater than 1 while at home. Noon: Give Darren an Influence bonus up to the number of your Dudes in this location. Darren's Upkeep cost is increased by an equal amount. The Influence bonus lasts until after Nightfall this turn, and the increased Upkeep cost lasts until after Nightfall next turn.

name: David Hope
effect: Noon: Reduce David's value by 2 permanently. David gains +3 to his Blessed skill until after Nightfall. If David's Value is less than 2, he is aced.

name: Deep in the Earth Shaft
effect: Private. Strike. Controller Reaction: Immediately after a Dude at this location is aced, increase the Production of this Deed by 1, permanently.

name: Deputy Tophet
effect: Noon: Target a Dude with a Spell or Mystical Goods card attached. That Dude becomes Wanted until after Nightfall.

name: Desperate Measures
effect: Reaction: Play when another player brings a Dude from a different Outfit into play. Increase the Upkeep cost of that Dude by 3 until after Nightfall next turn.

name: Distracted!
effect: Reaction: Play after a Spell resolves. Ace the Spell.

name: Divided Loyalties
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. Target a Dude controlled by that player whose Value is less than the illegal Draw hand's rank plus 4. You take control of the Dude until after Nightfall. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

name: Doctor Duvalier Exp.
effect: Experienced. Huckster:2

name: Doctor Hardstrom
effect: Mad Scientist:1 Reaction Pull: Boot Dr. Hardstrom when you bring a Terror into play. If the pull is less than the Terror's Value, the Terror gains a permanent +2 bonus.

name: Draw!
effect: Shootout Miracle 4: If this Miracle succeeds, you may draw one additional card to make your Draw hand for this round of the shootout. Shootout Miracle 8: If this Miracle succeeds, you may draw two additional cards to make your Draw hand for this round of the shootout.

name: Eagle Bow
effect: Unique. Mystical. Weapon. Noon: This Dude gains an Influence bonus or a Bullet bonus (you choose) equal to the number of your Shamen in Boot Hill, until after Nightfall.

name: Eagle Rock Exp. 2
effect: Experienced 2. Shootout: Move Eagle Rock to the location of the shootout, ignoring movement restrictions. Eagle Rock joins your posse. Shootout: Target one of your other Dudes in this shootout. Move the Dude to another location that is out of town - the Dude is no longer in the shootout. This action may be used any number of times per turn.

name: Elephant Hill Mausoleum
effect: Private. When the Mausoleum controller's Harrowed Dudes are aced, that player performs the Harrowed pull from his or her own deck.

name: Elijah Exp. 2
effect: Experienced 2. Blessed:4 Noon Job: Boot Elijah to start a job that targets another player's Dude with a Mystical Goods card attached. If the job succeeds, the Dude and Goods card are aced (if still in play), and you gain 1 Victory Point.

name: Ethics Aside...
effect: Reaction Pull: Play when you fail a Gadget skill check. If the new Pull is red, the skill check succeeds and the Mad Scientist becomes wanted.

name: Evan Childes
effect: Noon: Boot Evan to protect this location. Until after Nightfall, other players' Dudes with a lower Value than Evan's may not move to this location.

name: Exploratory Trench
effect: Non-Unique. Private. Out of Town. The ghost rock cost of the Exploratory Trench is increased by 1 for each Exploratory Trench already in play.

name: Eyes That Cannot See
effect: Reaction: Play when one of your Duds is targeted with a Spell. If your Dude's Value is greater than the Value of the Dude casting the Spell, the Spell fails.

name: Father Terrance Exp.
effect: Experienced. Blessed:1 Reaction: Use when you bring a Blessed into play with a higher Blessed skill than Father Terrance. Boot Father Terrance to get any 3 cards from your deck. Shuffle your deck, then place those 3 cards on top of your deck in any order.

name: Faulty Pipes
effect: Noon: Target a Saloon in play. Until after Nightfall next turn, that Deed's Control Points and Production are reduced to 0.

name: Faustian Deal
effect: Noon Hex 10: Target one of your other Dudes in the same location as this Huckster. If the Hex succeeds, the target Dude gains the Skill: Huckster: 1 and becomes a Stud until the end of the game. If the Hex fails, the target Dude is removed from play, and no other copies of the Dude may enter play for the rest of the game.

name: First To Fall
effect: Reaction: Play immediately before you ace casualties in a shootout. Ace the highest-Value Dude in your posse. Card effects cannot prevent this Dude from being aced or going to Boot Hill - Harrowed Dudes do not make a pull. The number of your casualties in this round of the shootout is reduced to zero.

name: Flashfire Bullets
effect: Bullet. Shootout: Ace the Flashfire Bullets to send home all Dudes in the opposing posse who have a Value less than or equal to this Dude's Bullet rating.

name: Flight Of Angels
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. Until the end of the game, whenever that player reveals an illegal Draw hand (including this one), that player must either make one of his or her un-Wanted Dudes Wanted, or ace one of his or her Wanted Dudes. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

name: Freak Show
effect: Public. After each Upkeep Phase, the Freak Show's Production and Control Points are reduced by 1, permanently. If this Deed ever has a production of 0, it is removed from play and no other copies can be played for the rest of the game. Terrors have a +1 Influence bonus while at the Freak Show.

name: Get Off My Land!
effect: Noon: Target one of your Dudes. Move the Dude to a location that you own, but do not control.

name: Ghost of My Father
effect: Shootout actions printed on Weapons attached to Ghost of My Father may be used twice per turn instead of once.

name: Giddyup!
effect: Reaction: Play immediately before one of your dudes boots to join a posse. Your dude does not have to boot to join this posse.

name: Gnosis
effect: Non-Unique. Mad Scientist:2 Gnosis may only produce Mystical Gadgets.

name: Guardian Angel
effect: Non-Unique. Blessed:1

name: Guy Fawkes Day
effect: Starting with the Winner and going clockwise, each player may target one in-town Deed. Targeted Deeds have their text boxes blanked until after Nightfall (those Deeds are considered public). Ace this card.

name: Haborym
effect: Harrowed. Blessed:0

name: Hatchet
effect: Weapon. Shootout: Discard the Hatchet to target a Dude in the opposing posse. The Dude has a -3 Bullet penalty until the end of this round of the shootout.

name: Hiding Out
effect: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the ability: "Noon: Boot this Dude to hide until after Nightfall. Until after Nightfall, this Dude has an Influence of 0 (which may not be modified), and may not be called out without a card effect." Ace this card.

name: I Gotta Stake in This!
effect: Reaction: Play when posses are being formed for a Shootout. Boot one of your Dudes, regardless of location, to move him or her into your posse.

name: Inner Strength
effect: Shootout: Boot one of your Dudes in this shootout to draw cards into your Play hand equal to the Dude's Value minus 10 (minimum 0 and maximum 3. For example, booting a Queen would draw 2 cards).

name: Insult to Injury
effect: Reaction: Play when your posse wins a round of a shootout. Your lead Shooter gains a +1 Influence bonus, permanently. Ace this card.

name: Interior Decorating
effect: Improvement. This Improvement may only be attached to an in-town Deed with production greater than zero.

name: It's For Her Own Good
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. Reduce that player's maximum hand size by 2 (minimum 0) until after Nightfall next turn. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

name: Jack Brash
effect: Shootout: Boot Jack to target a Stud Dude in the opposing posse. The Dude becomes a Draw until the end of the shootout.

name: Jack Whateley
effect: Reaction: Boot Jack immediately before Nightfall to target another player's Dude who is alone at an in-town location. Jack moves to that location and calls the Dude out to a shootout that cannot be refused. Jack gains a +2 Bullet bonus until after Nightfall.

name: Jam!
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand. Target a Dude controlled by that player. Discard all cards attached to the Dude. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

name: Jenny Cooper Exp.
effect: Experienced. Noon: Boot Jenny to target another player's Dude at her location. The Dude must, as his or her controller's next Noon action, call out the Dude of your choice (not controlled by the same player) at this location.

name: Jolinaxas
effect: Huckster:2 Jolinaxas has a +1 Bullet bonus, a +1 Influence bonus, and a +1 Huckster skill while he has one or more copies of "Faustian Deal" attached.

name: Jordan Caldwell
effect: Caldwell ignores all movement restrictions.

name: Juliet "Jewel" Sumner Exp.
effect: Experienced. Reaction: Immediately before you perform a Noon action, move Jewel to the same location as another one of your Blackjack Dudes.

name: Just What I Need
effect: Shootout: Pay all costs for a non-Gadget Goods in your Play hand and attach it to one of your Dudes in this shootout, regardless of who controls the location. If the Goods is a Weapon, it can be readied immediately.

name: Last Request
effect: Reaction: Play after one of your Dudes with a Mystical Goods card attached has been aced. Attach that Mystical Goods card to any one of your Dudes that may legally attach the Goods card, or place it in your discard pile.

name: Life of the Party
effect: Noon: Target an unbooted Dude. Move the Dude to a Saloon or Brothel. The ghost rock cost of this card is equal to the Dude's Influence (minimum 1).

name: Lillith
effect: Abomination. If this Dude has been aced and is in Boot Hill, you may ace one of your other Dudes as a Noon action to return this Dude to play at your home, unbooted.

name: Lost Angels
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:19 Your Mystical Goods have their ghost rock cost reduced by 2. Reaction: Boot one of your Dudes immediately before a skill check for a Spell is made. The Spell automatically fails.

name: Lt. Colonel Frederick Sykes
effect: Noon: Boot Sykes and target an un-Wanted Dude with both Value and Influence less than Sykes'. That Dude becomes Wanted. Noon: Boot Sykes and target one of your Wanted Dudes. That Dude becomes un-Wanted.

name: Lucifer's Cane
effect: Unique. Mystical. Weapon. Noon: This Dude gains an Influence bonus or a Bullet bonus (you choose) equal to the number of your Blessed in Boot Hill.

name: Lyin' In Wait
effect: Reaction: Immediately before the Upkeep Phase, target a Wanted Dude. The Dude has his or her Upkeep cost increased by 2 until after Nightfall.

name: Lynchin' Noose
effect: Wanted Dudes in this location have zero Influence.

name: Magic Bus V. 2.0 (Death Bus)
effect: Horse. Gadget Difficulty:4 Noon: Discard a card from your hand to move this Dude to an adjacent location. This action may be performed any number of times per turn.

name: Mercy
effect: Reaction: Play immediately before your opponent begins acing casualties in a shootout. If that player took 2 or more casualties and has at least 2 Dudes in the shootout, that player's casualties are reduced to 0, and you gain 1 Victory Point.

name: Midnight Snack
effect: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. Until the end of the game, the Dude has the abilities: "Shootout: Target another of your Harrowed Dudes. Move the Dude into this posse, ignoring movement restrictions," and "Noon: Target another of your Harrowed Dudes. Move the Dude to this location, ignoring movement restrictions." Ace this card.

name: Min Su Tao
effect: Noon: Target a Dude that has "Vampire" or "Vampiric" in its Title or as a trait. Move Min Su Tao to the Vampire's location and call out that Dude. The callout may not be refused.

name: Moloch
effect: Abomination.

name: Mr. Applegate, Esq.
effect: Reaction: Boot Mr. Applegate and pay 6 ghost rock when an action is discarding or acing one of your cards in play to cancel the action.

name: Mr. Slate Exp.
effect: Experienced. Abomination. Vampire. Mr. Slate may not be called out by non-Terror Dudes.

name: Mysterious Ways
effect: Noon Miracle 6: Target one of your Wanted Dudes. If this Miracle succeeds, the Dude becomes un-Wanted.

name: New Pony Express Office
effect: Private. Experienced. Pony Express. When this Deed enters play, target an out of town Deed. While this Deed is in play, the target Deed is considered to be adjacent and in-town.

name: Night Sentry
effect: Improvement. Owner Shootout: A Sentry joins your posse for the duration of this shootout. The Sentry is a 1 Stud, 0 Influence, ace-Value token Dude. Remove the token Dude from play after the shootout.

name: No Way Out!
effect: Improvement. Call outs occurring at this location may not be refused without a card effect.

name: Nyctophobia
effect: Noon: Target a Dude in play. The Dude has a -1 Bullet penalty (minimum 0) and a -1 Influence penalty (minimum 0) until after Nightfall while at a Strike.

name: O'Reilly's Five & Dime
effect: Public. Controller Noon: Pay 1 ghost rock to target a Goods or Spell in your Boot Hill. Shuffle that card into your deck.

name: Old Scratch
effect: Old Scratch may attach (but not use) any Spell card. Your Blessed, Hucksters, and Shamen in the same location as Old Scratch may use Spells attached to Old Scratch as if they were attached to themselves. A Spell may only be used once per turn in this fashion.

name: One Eyed Jacks are Wild
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another player reveals an illegal Draw hand when you also have a Draw hand. You may change the value and suit of one card in your Draw hand as if it were a Joker. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

name: Oswald Hardinger Exp.
effect: Experienced. Mad Scientist:5 Oswald may not move out of town. Oswald does not need to boot to create Gadgets with a Value less than his Mad Scientist skill. Noon: Move Oswald to an in town location.

name: Pandora's Box
effect: Unique. Mystical. Weapon. Noon: This Dude gains an Influence bonus or a Bullet bonus (you choose) equal to the number of your Hucksters in Boot Hill.

name: Perdition
effect: Abomination. Blessed Dudes in a posse with Perdition have a +1 Bullet bonus and a +1 Blessed skill.

name: Phantoms
effect: Shootout: Target a Dude in this shootout. That Dude cannot be targeted with actions until the end of the shootout.

name: Poker Night
effect: Put one to four ghost rock into the "pot", matching that amount from the Bank. Any other player may play by matching the amount from their vault. Each participating player draws seven cads to make his or her Draw hand, with the best hand winning the pot. Players revealing an illegal hand cannot win the pot (if all players reveal an illegal hand, the pot goes to the Bank).

name: Power Plant
effect: Private. While this Deed is at either end of your Street, its Production is increased by 2.

name: Prison Factory
effect: Private. Out of Town. Government. The Factory has +1 additional production for each Dude who is out of play in the Jail.

name: Prospectus' Secret Workshop
effect: Private. Players other than the owner must discard a card from their Play hand to move a Dude to the Workshop. Controller Noon: Target a Mad Scientist at this location. His or her Mad Scientist skill is increased by +2 until after Nightfall.

name: Rachel Sumner Exp. 2
effect: Experienced 2. Noon Job: Boot Rachel to target an in-town Deed owned by another player worth 1 or more Control Points. If the job succeeds, permanently reduce the Control Points of the Deed by 1, and you gain 1 Victory Point.

name: Raymond Armstrong Exp.
effect: Experienced. Raymond is a Stud while there is a Texas Ranger controlled by another player in the same location.

name: Recruiter
effect: Unique. Improvement. This Improvement may only be attached to your Home. Any Dudes from your outfit that you bring into play have their ghost rock cost reduced by 1 (minimum 0).

name: Registry
effect: Public. Government. Controller Reaction: Boot the Registry immediately before the Upkeep Phase and target a Deed. The owner of that Deed controls it until after Nightfall, regardless of Influence totals.

name: Requiem
effect: Noon: Target a Dude in the same location as Requiem. That Dude is considered a Terror until after Nightfall.

name: Rescue Operation
effect: Noon Job: Boot one of your Dudes to start a job that targets the Town Square. Any player may defend the job, starting with the Winner and going clockwise. Before posses are formed, go through your deck, remove a Dude and show that card to the other players. If this job succeeds, add the Dude to your Play hand. If the Job fails, put the Dude into Boot Hill.

name: Rooster Beenz
effect: Reaction: When Beenz is called out, move him to an adjacent location to refuse the callout even if it may not normally be refused.

name: Run 'Em Down!
effect: Shootout: All of your Dudes in this Posse with Horses attached either gain a +1 Bullet bonus or become Studs (your choice for each Dude), until the end of the shootout.

name: Rustlers
effect: Starting with the Winner and going clockwise, each player may discard one of their Horses in play to gain 5 ghost rock.

name: Sabtabiel's Remains
effect: Unique. Mystical. Shootout: Boot this Dude. If this Dude is still in play immediately before Nightfall, you may raise or lower the Fear Level by 1.

name: Salvage Operation
effect: Public. Dudes at this location may always attach Goods, regardless of who controls the Salvage Operation. Controller Reaction: Perform this action immediately before you attach a Goods card to one of your Dudes at this Deed. Discard another Goods card attached to that Dude to produce ghost rock equal to half the discarded Good's cost (rounded up).

name: Screamers
effect: Bullet. Reaction: Discard the Screamers when another player performs a Shootout action to cancel the action. The action has no effect.

name: Seeking Fury
effect: Shaman:0 Noon: Discard a card from your Play hand to draw a card from your deck.

name: Sepulcher
effect: Unique. Improvement. During each round of a shootout at this location, immediately before casualties are aced, both players must ace one Dude in their posse.

name: Sewer Tunnels
effect: Improvement. This Improvement may only be attached to an in-town Deed. Wanted Dudes in this location gain a +1 Influence bonus.

name: Sewing Circle
effect: Noon: Target a Harrowed dude in Boot Hill. Return the dude to his or her owner's hand.

name: Shave and a Haircut
effect: Noon: Target a Dude in play. The Dude gains a +2 Influence bonus until after Nightfall.

name: Sheriff Syn
effect: Huckster:0 Reaction: Boot Sheriff Syn to cancel a Shootout Action card played during a shootout she is in.

name: Shigetoshi Hohiro Exp.
effect: Experienced. Blessed:2 Reaction Pull: Boot Shigetoshi when a Spell targets one of your Dudes at this location. If the pull plus Shigetoshi's Blessed rating is greater than the Spell's difficulty, the Spell is canceled without effect.

name: Simon Lambeth
effect: Abomination. Blessed:X Simon's Blessed rating is equal to the number of other Blessed in this location.

name: Sin Je
effect: Shootout: Target a booted Dude in the opposing posse. Ready Weapons attached to that Dude are made unready. That Dude may not ready a Weapon until after the shootout ends. When the shootout ends, that Dude may ready a Weapon.

name: Sioux- Spirit Warriors
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:18 Dudes you ace in a shootout are removed from play - no Harrowed pulls are made and card effects cannot be used to prevent the Dude being aced. No other copies of those Dudes may enter play for the rest of the game.

name: Sister Mercy Winters
effect: Shootout: Target a Spell attached to a Dude in the opposing posse. Discard the Spell.

name: Soul Blast Cannon
effect: Mystical. Weapon. Gadget Difficulty:9 This Dude is a Stud. Shootout: Target a Dude in the opposing posse and make a skill check using this Dude's Mad Scientist skill (if any). If the skill check exceeds the target Dude's Value plus Bullet rating, send the Dude home booted. If the skill check exceeds the target's Value plus Bullet Rating by more than 5, ace the Dude instead.

name: Spirit Walk
effect: Noon Hex 6: If this Hex succeeds, then until after Nightfall, your next illegal Draw hand may not be targeted by Cheatin'! cards. Instead, you must ace one of your Dudes when you reveal your next illegal Draw hand.

name: Spring Cleaning
effect: Improvement. Controller Noon: Name a Value (A through K). This Deed has that Value until after Nightfall.

name: Stallion
effect: Horse. Reaction: Use immediately before you perform a Noon action. Boot the Stallion to move this Dude to any location in play. You may not use this action if this Dude is booted.

name: Strikers' Shaft
effect: Non-Unique. Private. Strike. Dudes with 0 Influence have 1 Influence for determining control of this Deed.

name: The Beast Within
effect: Noon Spirit 6: If this Spirit succeeds, shuffle your discard pile into your deck and ace this Spirit.

name: The C.S.A. Ourobouros
effect: Private. Government. Agency Dudes may not move to this Location. The ghost rock cost to bring this Deed into play is reduced by 2 if you are a Texas Rangers player.

name: The Good Book
effect: Unique. Mystical. Reaction: Boot this Dude immediately before the Gambling Phase. Any player that does not ante 2 additional ghost rock may not resolve any events during lowball.

name: The Perch
effect: Public. Out of Town. Brothel. Saloon. Controller Noon: Unboot all dudes at this location.

name: This'll Teach You
effect: Noon: All Wanted Dudes in play have a Draw Bullet type until after Nightfall. Ace this card.

name: Three-Card Monte
effect: Noon: Use when this Dude is in the Town Square. Gain 1 Ghost Rock. Noon Pull: Boot this Dude while he or she is in the Town Square to target another Dude in the Town Square. If the pull is greater than the target Dude's Value, take 1 ghost rock from his or her controller.

name: Three-Piece Suit
effect: This Dude's Value is increased by 3 (maximum K). A Dude may only attach one Three-Piece Suit.

name: Thunderbird Exp.
effect: Experienced. Shaman:4 Noon: Ace a Spirit attached to Thunderbird to get a card from your discard pile and add it to your Play hand.

name: Trouble There, Buck?
effect: Reaction: Play when an action on a Horse card is used. That action is canceled and has no effect.Noon: Discard a Horse card from play.

name: Two Birds Chirping Exp.
effect: Experienced. Shaman:1 Two Birds has a +2 Bullet bonus and a +2 Influence bonus while he has one or more Goods attached that can only be attached to a Sioux.

name: Tzipporah Whateley Exp.
effect: Experienced. Huckster:2 Noon: This action can only be used once per game. Target a Dude in play with a Value less than Tzipporah's. Until the end of the game, you may perform the following action once per turn. Noon: Put a Spell card from your Play hand into Boot Hill to boot the targeted Dude.

name: Under The Gun
effect: Reaction: Play immediately before another Player makes a pull. The pull is drawn from any deck you choose.

name: War Cry
effect: Noon Spirit 4: If this Spirit succeeds, this Dude is a Stud until after Nightfall. Shootout Spirit 8: Target another of your Dudes in this posse. If this Spirit succeeds, both this shaman and the target Dude are Studs until the end of the shootout.

name: Watering Hole
effect: Non-Unique. Public. Saloon. Dudes moving to the Watering Hole are booted.

name: We've Got Hostages
effect: Reaction: Play when one of your Dudes is called out. The Dude refuses the call out, moves home booted, and becomes Wanted.

name: Well Of Souls
effect: Unique. Improvement. You must boot a Blessed Dude to put this Improvement into play. This Improvement may only be attached to an in-town Deed. Dudes aced at this location are not aced, but are discarded instead. If the Dude is a Blessed, the Dude is sent home booted.

name: William Rose
effect: Non-Unique. William gains a +2 Bullet bonus while he is Wanted.

name: Working Out the Details
effect: Select a Deed. Beginning with the player on your left, each player may move one Dude to that Deed.

name: You're Comin' With Us!
effect: Noon Job: Target a skilled Dude in play. Boot one of your Dudes to start a job to recruit that Dude. If the job succeeds, pay the target's controller 2 ghost rock to take control of the Dude until after Nightfall. The Dude moves to your home and unboots (if necessary. If the target is aced during the shootout, the target is not aced (regardless of card effects), and the job is immediately successful. Immediately before Nightfall, if still in play, the Dude returns to his or her owner's control and goes home booted.

name: You've Got This Comin'!
effect: Noon Job: Boot one of your Dudes at an out-of-town Deed owned by another player. The Dude starts a job that targets that Deed. If the job succeeds, take an amount of ghost rock from that player equal to the Deed's current production, or the player's total ghost rock if less. All Dudes in your posse become Wanted.

name: Zeke Hillard
effect: Zeke is a Stud while he is at a Strike.
